text: dauchnaoh haey yeung ban banhchouh vea( kompir kuor an) chea b nhnh tde tam pheasaea areab . te brasenbae anak( mou ham meat) ban thveuteam tomneung chetd robsa puokke kraoypi chamnehdoeng ban mokadl anak haey noh anak kmean anak keapear na krawpi a l laoh laey haeyka kmean anaknea karpar( pi tearounakamm robsa trong) der
